content: Is this running SimplifyCfg twice on purpose or is that just an oversight? https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/41dc3942eb33e8e882b6e4782a9bd9d2b8970647/compiler/rustc_mir/src/transform/mod.rs#L469-L470
